TopicTitle: Physics still enabled on parts moved during EVA construction (modlist in post)

Articles.Content:
prpretty self explanatory from the video, any idea what could be causing this and solutions to the issue?

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/295199794102796288/794310947475947560/Kerbal_Space_Program_2020-12-30_14-05-57_Trim.mp4
(video of issue)

I have the same issue, we share this mods:

B9 Part switch

Community Ressource Pack

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

NEAR Future Construction + IVA Probs

Maybe this helps to figure out something, i will also test ist ;-)
I found the Mod that causes that problem. It's  Kerbal Joint Reinforcement.
